definitions.definition: a person who owns or rents a small piece of land and grows crops, keeps animals, etc. on it, especially one who has a low income, very little education, and a low social position. This is usually used of someone who lived in the past or of someone in a poor country:
examples: Tons of internationally donated food was distributed to the starving peasants.

definitions.definition: a person who is not well educated or is rude and does not behave well:
